bibl.title: Ethnic Minorities in Hellenistic Egypt.
bibl.note: The position of the Jews of Herakleopolis is highlighted as a case study. Much that is found for this community can be documented elsewhere for the minority communities of Ptolemaic Egypt.

bibl.title: with the assistance of C.G. WILLIAMSON, Political Culture in the Greek City after the Classical Age.

bibl.seg: THOMPSON Dorothy J., Ethnic Minorities in Hellenistic Egypt.

Onno M. VAN NIJF and Richard ALSTON (Edd.), with the assistance of C.G. WILLIAMSON, Political Culture in the Greek City after the Classical Age = Groningen - Royal Holloway Studies on the Greek City after the Classical Age. 2 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2011) pp. 101-113.
The position of the Jews of Herakleopolis is highlighted as a case study. Much that is found for this community can be documented elsewhere for the minority communities of Ptolemaic Egypt.
